about_the_game:
IMPORTANT: IF YOU WISH TO INCREASE THE VISIBILITY OF THE GAME, PRESS ESCAPE, AND TURN OFF POST PROCESSING UNDER GAMEPLAY

NOTE: This is the first game that I have released on Steam as a high school student. Please be patient as I address all the problems and bugs with the game as a solo dev.

Welcome to "The Labyrinth" – an electrifying multiplayer action platformer that will push your speed, strategy, and teamwork to the limit! Are you ready to embark on an exciting journey through crossroads, pitfalls, and deep treachery?

In "The Labyrinth," your mission is clear: win by reaching the coveted gold chest at the end of each level. But don’t be fooled by this seemingly straightforward goal – this game is a whirlwind of challenges and excitement.

Special Features

Shaped Maps:

Each time you play, a map is designed in a way that allows for a unique experience. Say goodbye to monotony and hello to near-infinite replayability! This game thrives on surprises, and improves your ability to adapt to ever-changing environments.

Dangerous Roads:

Be careful, adventurer! The road to glory is fraught with danger. Insidious traps, insidious obstacles and mind-numbing puzzles await to hinder your progress. Only the cunning and quick-witted will emerge victorious.

Multiplayer Mayhem:

You are not alone in this journey. "The Labyrinth" is a multiplayer adventure, which puts you among friends and players around the world in a race to the end. It’s not just about reaching the chest – it’s about getting there before anyone else. Team up or go solo, the choice is yours, but remember, only one can emerge as the ultimate winner of this labyrinthine battlefield.

Gameplay Highlights

Stunning Visuals and Immersive Soundscape:

The game's breathtaking visuals and immersive sound design draw you into its world, where danger and excitement revolve in all cases. Quick thinking, strategic planning, and a bit of fun will guide you through the challenges ahead.

Intensive Challenges and Puzzles:

Tackle a variety of intense challenges and puzzles that keep you on your toes. Each level presents new challenges that require both skill and strategy to overcome.

Competition and Cooperation Opportunities:

Whether you're in it for the glory or the fellowship, "The Labyrinth" offers both competition and cooperation opportunities. Team up with friends to conquer levels together or continue in a headlong race to the end.

The Challenge Awaits

So gather your friends, lace up your shoelaces, and step into the ever-evolving maze. Will you conquer its treacherous passages and claim victory, or will you fall prey to its deceptive snares? Only time will tell in this electric race for supremacy!

Prepare yourself for a unique adventure. Welcome to "The Labyrinth."

Enjoy! :)

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+
  • Processor: 2 Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 150 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 100 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+
  • Processor: 2 Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 200 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS version 10.13.4 or 10.14.1 or 10.15.4 or newer
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: An OpenGL supported GPU
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: MacOS version 10.13.4 or 10.14.1 or 10.15.4 or newer
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated GPU or eGPU or a Metal
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: The Labyrinth

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+) , Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 or equivalent
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Race friends in trap-filled mazes. Reach the gold chest first in 'The Labyrinth' – Can you escape?
